name: 2D Ground Truth Sensor
description:
This sensor outputs an image where objects are encased in a box. The color of the box depends on the type of object.
	[
		"Car": "Green"
		"Pedestrian": "Yellow"
		"Bicycle": "Cyan"
		"Unknown":  "Magenta"
	]
See {{DOCS_HOST}}/docs/python-api/#2d-ground-truth for more details.
